config.text: Created by Kendall County GIS

Welcome to the

Kendall County GIS

Digital Change Record!

This viewer is meant to show all significant changes made to the Kendall County maps. By presenting these changes in a clear, interactive manner, our hope is to make these changes as accessible as possible.


Currently, this viewer is a work in progress. The current focus is on the ordinance-based changes, but other capabilities will be added in the future.


To see the specific instructions for each page, click the other section titles above, or click the arrows at the sides of this panel.


Click the Help button in the lower-left at any time to display this again.
Using the Taxing Bodies Page

This page will show historic ordinance-based changes to taxing bodies within Kendall County.


What is a "taxing body"?


A taxing body is any entity that levies taxes. When you look at your property taxes, you can see that a certain amount goes to the schools, another amount to the library district, etc. Those entities are the taxing bodies your property falls within.


Navigating

At the left side of the page, you will find a list of document numbers. Clicking any of these items will zoom to the relevant area and filter the maps to show the features involved.


Above this list are filters. You can toggle the different record types on and off, and set a range for the recorded date, and the list will update accordingly.


Within the list, you can search for specific document and ordinance numbers, as well as change the sort order.


The Map

In the center of the screen is the map. This map shows any features which were annexed or deannexed by the selected document.


PINs List

The list at the right shows the PINs involved in the selected ordinance. Click on a PIN in this list to see it flash on the map.


This list can be collapsed by clicking the arrow tab on the left edge of the list.

config.text: BEFORE
AFTER
Using the Zoning Page

This page will show historic ordinance-based changes to zoning in Kendall County, as well as the establishing and revoking of zoning permits.


Navigating

At the left side of the page, you will find a list of document numbers. Clicking any of these items will zoom to the relevant area and filter the maps to show the features involved.


Above this list are filters. You can toggle the different record types on and off, and set a range for the recorded date, and the list will update accordingly.


Within the list, you can search for specific document and ordinance numbers, as well as change the sort order.


The Maps

In the center of the screen are the Before and After maps. These show zoning features established and/or revoked by a given record.


PINs List

The list at the right shows the PINs involved in the selected ordinance. Click on a PIN in this list to see it flash on the map.


This list can be collapsed by clicking the arrow tab on the left edge of the list.

where.displaySQL: (Record Type is any of (Incorporated Deannexation,Incorporated Annexation))
